entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
